title: Practical Course Utilizing Design Knowledge Situated Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic design principles and architectural design processes
context.additional_context: An in-company training program where in-service professionals learn design knowledge using digital tools in real-world design scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the situational context of design configurations using multiple representational media (floor plans, 3D models, 3D renderings, etc.).
Learners can discover relationships between design elements through architectural case studies and apply them to real-world projects.
Learners can perform an iterative design improvement process based on peer feedback using collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
